author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Medical Facilities Corp Announces Approval Of Normal Course Issuer Bid
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Medical Facilities Corp:
* MEDICAL FACILITIES CORPORATION ANNOUNCES APPROVAL OF NORMAL COURSE ISSUER BID
* MEDICAL FACILITIES - TORONTO STOCK EXCHANGE APPROVED NOTICE OF INTENTION TO MAKE NCIB FOR UP TO 619,665 OF ITS OUTSTANDING COMMON SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
